verses.text: Ix tak'vixi vinhaj Job chi' icha tic:
Ayxo scajvi in te ab'an juntzanh lolonel tzeyalub'tanhej tic. Tzeyak'och e b'a eyak'an snivanil in k'ool, palta anhej yaelal tze vach' iq'uejcot d'a vib'anh.
¿Tom malaj slajvub' juntzanh e lolonel malaj yelk'och tic? ¿Tas eyaji yuj chi' anhej val a' e pacan d'ayin?
Q'uinaloc a ex tic icha val vaj tic eyaji, max am val-laj icha tzeyutej eyalan tic d'ayin, max am in tzicub'tanhej in sat valan jantac lolonel d'ayex.
Palta jun, a am lolonel vach' syak' snivanil e k'ool, syak' e tek'anil, a am sval d'ayex.
Manh yujoc to tzin loloni, tz'och vaan in yaelal tic, manh yujoc pax to tzin em numan tz'ochpax vaan.
A Dios tz'ak'an lajvoquel vip. A pax tz'ik'anel eb' vamigo d'ayin.
Ichato preso vaj yuuj. Jantac tas syik'chaanh eb' anima d'a in patic, jantac es lolonel syik'cot eb' d'a vib'anh.
A Dios tzak'anoch vuuj yic tzin sataneli, icha junoc nok' chium nok'. Ay val och sat d'ayin, icha val to vajk'ool yaji.
Jantac eb' anima smolb'ej sb'a yic tzin sb'uchan eb'. Stz'itanb'at in sat eb', emnaquil tzin yutejcan eb'.
A Dios ix in ak'anoch d'a yol sk'ab' juntzanh anima te chuc spensar.
Junk'olal vajeq'ui, ix in svecchitani. Ix och yub'naj d'a in jaj, chok' ix in yutej, ix in yak'anoch d'a sat sjul-lab'.
Yalnhej b'aj sjavi sjul-lab' chi' d'ayin, ichato sk'axpaj d'a in nivanil tic, manhxa jab'oc snivank'olal d'ayin. Toxonhej spuccanb'at yol in k'ol d'a sat luum.
Jantac in aj in lajvi yuuj. Scot val d'ayin icha junoc soldado te tek'an.
Te cusk'olal vaji, ayoch pichul ya sva vuuj, manhxa jab'oc vopisio.
Ste mal in sat voq'ui, sq'uik'b'i q'uinal svila'.
Icha chi' vaji, vach'chom malaj mach b'aj ix och in mul, vach'nhej in lesal.
Mocab' k'ub'chajel jantac chucal ix ak'jioch d'a vib'anh. Ab'chajocab'i ayic tzin tevi yic tzin k'anan tojolal.
Ay jun ayoch in testigooc ayek' d'a satchaanh, a' ol och ved'oc.
A eb' vamigo tonhej tzin sb'uch eb', a inxo tic tzin ok'nhej d'a yichanh Dios.
Ayoc val junoc mach tz'alan d'a Dios vuuj, icha syutej junoc mach scolan junoc yetanimail.
Jayexonhej ab'il ayin eq'ui, axo in b'at d'a chamel chi' b'aj maxtzac yal co paxta.
